name: FeedbackBot
description: A Pyrogram-based Telegram feedback bot with MongoDB, optional features like image cloud, news, and product catalog support.

ADMINS.description: Comma-separated list of admin Telegram user IDs

LOG.description: Log group or channel ID where the bot will send logs

MONGO.description: Full MongoDB URI for storing user and feedback data

IMG_CLOUD.description: Enable image upload to ImgBB (True or False)

IMGBB_API_KEY.description: ImgBB API key (only needed if IMG_CLOUD=True)

GNEWS_KEY.description: GNews API key (used for fetching news)

WEB_RESPONSE.description: Name or ID used in web response (default: nxmirror)

SOURCE.description: URL of the bot source code (default: https://github.com/Krshnasys/FeedbackBot)

PRODUCTS.description: Enable product catalog mode (True or False)
